Title: Paladin Calling
Description:
Adds a simple Mechanimist paladin calling, complete with a custom sprite. Intended to be balanced in a similar way to the existing callings.

Class features:
[list]
[*]+2 Toughness
[*]Cudgel
[*]Shield
[*]Shield Slam
[*]Charge
[*]+300 reputation with the Mechanimists
[/list]

Starting equipment:
[list]
[*]Bronze Mace
[*]Steel Shield
[*]Leather Armor
[*]Leather Moccasins
[/list]

Starting items:
[list]
[*]1 copy of The Canticles Chromaic, Verses XVII-XXIV
[*]9-15 torches
[*]2 empty waterskins
[*]2 waterskins with 32 drams of fresh water each
[*]8-10 goat jerkies
[*]3-4 witchwood bark
[/list]
